sub_title: Assistant Professor of Law at Leiden University
summary: I am a Meijers PhD researcher and a lecturer at Leiden Law School, Institute of Private Law (Leiden, The Netherlands). My research focuses on the role and place of intra-group financial arrangements (e.g. cross-guarantees, intra-group loans, cross-collateralization) in rescue and restructuring of ailing groups of companies, including banking groups. I am also interested in new technologies, including AI and blockchain, and how they affect and transform financial practices, as well as rules of corporate and insolvency law.
